[`init?(contentsOfFile: String)`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/init(contentsoffile:))Initializes and returns the image object with the contents of the specified file.[`init?(data: Data)`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/init(data:))Initializes and returns the image object with the specified data.[`init?(data: Data, scale: CGFloat)`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/init(data:scale:))Initializes and returns the image object with the specified data and scale factor.[`init(cgImage: CGImage)`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/init(cgimage:))Initializes and returns the image object with the specified Quartz image reference.[`init(cgImage: CGImage, scale: CGFloat, orientation: UIImage.Orientation)`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/init(cgimage:scale:orientation:))Initializes and returns an image object with the specified scale and orientation factors.[`init(ciImage: CIImage)`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/init(ciimage:))Initializes and returns an image object with the specified Core Image object.[`init(ciImage: CIImage, scale: CGFloat, orientation: UIImage.Orientation)`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/init(ciimage:scale:orientation:))Initializes and returns an image object with the specified Core Image object and properties.
